text: [Music]
I think if John Adams Jefferson
Washington Hamilton and the others were
to come back today they would be amazed
that the system of government that they
created is still in place that our
constitution is still there that we
still have the Bill of Rights that they
created and I think they would be very
proud of that that we have an
independent Judiciary for example that
the uh legislature is H in two parts
Senate and a house and that the
president is the chief executive that
would all please them enormously because
the odds were that it would not survive
that the nation has survived it did not
pull itself
apart uh they would be amazed by our
Dentistry our
medicine our um capacity to build
skyscrapers and and bridges and all of
that the speed at which
we uh communicate and the speed at which
we move from one place to
another I think they would think they
would feel that we were rather
soft and um uh that we really hadn't
been through anything like they had
experienced they um and I think that
their um stomachs might turn a little at
the role of money in our politics now
and the uh degree to which uh politics
has been turned into merchandising and
marketing and advertising and value
